common.notTranslated: This page does not yet have a translation for your language :<

login-hello.introduction:
Welcome to the Love Live! School Idol Festival! private server.
Please do not post screenshots, videos and other content from this server in social media or we will have troubles, and also follow our TOS.
Thank you!

login-login.ifYouLostLoginDataContactUs: If you forgot/lost your login or password, you can contact us!
login-login.successDescriptionLogin:
You have successfully logged in!
Close this window to enter the game.
login-login.mailNotExists: Account with this E-mail does not exist
login-login.mailSendingError: An error occurred while sending the letter. Try again later
login-login.passwordResetSuccess: A new password has been sent to your mail
login-login.mailSuccess: A letter with a verification code was sent to the specified E-mail
login-login.confirmationCodeNotExists: Verification code is outdated, get a new one

login-startup.checkMail:
We sent an email to the your email address mail.
Check the Spam folder if you cannot find it.
login-startup.successDescription:
Account #{{userId}} successfully created! Remember/save this number, it will be useful to you when you'll try to login.
{{mail}}To continue registration close this window.
login-startup.emailExists: An account with the specified E-mail is already registered

noticemarquee.maintenanceNotice: In the period from {{startDay}} {{startTime}} to {{endDay}} {{endTime}} UTC{{timeZone}}, game access will be restricted due to a scheduled maintenance
